thread.title: Bharti Airtel launches 4G trial in four cities
thread.title_full: Bharti Airtel launches 4G trial in four cities

author: IANS
title: Bharti Airtel launches 4G trial in four cities
text: Moneylife » Companies & Sectors » Company News & Trends » Bharti Airtel launches 4G trial in four cities 42897 Bharti Airtel launches 4G trial in four cities 0 Comments, Be the first to comment + COMMENT IANS | 24/07/2015 04:19 PM | Bharti Airtel rolled out fourth generation (4G) trials in four cities on Friday, a company statement said here. The cities are Rourkela in Odisha and Manipal, Udupi and Tumkur in Karnataka. With these launches, the company now offers 4G in 44 cities in India. The company first launched its 4G services in Kolkata in April 2012. The statement said Bharti Airtel customers in these cities can now avail a complimentary upgrade to Airtel 4G at 3G prices. Airtel has also announced a go-to-market partnerships with Samsung and Flipkart for 4G devices. More in Moneylife
